title: Seb Coe splits from his wife after 13 years | Daily Mail Online
snippet: Olympic gold medallist Sebastian Coe, who received a life peerage for his services to William Hague, has parted from his wife Nicola after 13 years' marriage.

title: Sebastian Coe - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1990, when resident in Surrey, Coe married Nicky McIrvine, a former Badminton three-day-event champion, with whom he has two sons and two daughters. The marriage ended in divorce in 2002 after twelve years.

title: Seb Coe set to be named in divorce; HUSBAND ACCUSES HIM. - Free Online Library
snippet: "He began an affair with my wife almost a year ago and she moved out in December purely because of their relationship. I'm very angry. They have been together for much longer than they claim. We've got children. He ruined my marriage." Mr Annett refused to comment on his divorce plans, but a family friend said: "There is a strong possibility that he will be identified as the co-respondent when Mr Annett files for divorce. It will be highly embarrassing for Lord Coe - particularly given his new, high-profile role as head of London's Olympics bid."" Earlier this year Lord Coe invited blonde Carole, 38, to accompany him to an Athens resort where he was on a working holiday to see Greece's preparations for this summer's Olympics.

title: Seb Coe is dating Lionel Richie's glamorous ex-wife: Twice-married World Athletics boss, 69, has found love again with US model and fashion designer Diane Richie, 58 | Daily Mail Online
snippet: Lord Coe, who has been married twice before himself, is very serious about Ms Richie, taking her as his plus-one to arguably his most important work event of 2025.
